goal.ch: 培養學生學術發表能力
goal.en: Development of students‘ academic presentation skills

outline.ch: 口頭報告、企業/學術研究單位參訪以及邀請演講
outline.en: Oral Presentation, Enterprise/academic institution Visiting, and Invited Seminar

講授
研討

gradMethod.ch:
口頭報告：60％
課堂參與：20％
報告撰寫：20％
違規扣分(依課堂規定)
gradMethod.en:
Oral Presentation: 60％ 
Participation (Q＆A): 20％ 
Written report: 20％ 
Grade deduction when violating seminar regulations
